short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly close unproductive websites and keep your focus in check while!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"The Kill Switch" – Your secret extension to instantly close unproductive websites and keep your focus in check when it matters most! Whether you’re browsing casually or caught in a distraction loop, one click is all it takes to hide those time-wasting tabs and appear productive. Perfect for when someone suddenly walks in and you need to switch to work mode fast.

- Instantly close unproductive tabs with a single keypress
- Restore hidden tabs when you're back in the clear
- Fully customizable—set up your own list of distracting websites
- Discreet, fast, and hassle-free
